name: Oranguru
description: The Sage Pokémon. It normally spends its time meditating in the treetops. It throws Poké Balls and gives other Pokémon orders as it pleases.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to flinching.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be damaged by its allies' attacks.

abilities.name: Symbiosis
abilities.description: This Pokémon may swap held items with an ally as a free action, as long as they are within 15 feet of each other.
